entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Where is .NET SDK 5.0.416? The latest download is 5.0.408. #39409
  • Private dependencies appear in an app's deps.json file #39400

Closed

  • ContainerArchiveOutputPath is not effecive on new .NET 8 container support while running on Framework #36651
  • A new option to allow dotnet tool install should return exit code 0 if tool is already installed #10310
    Discussion
  • Support for codespaces #21299

PullRequests

Created

  • Watch UI #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fingerprint and Hash for SWA. #39405
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39389
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0.2xx] make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39267
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.4
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them #38048
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Enhance base image inference for trimmed applications - use -extras when globalization is in use #39317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
